item.title: Drug-Target Interaction
item.description: I’m working on drug-target interaction prediction projects, which can be used to screen potential drugs. I’m using tools from NLP community, e.g. language models. Wil share results soon.

item.title: Meta RL
item.description:
Sample efficiency is key to the real-world application of RL. That is we wish to minimize the interactions between the RL and the environment.

Right now, I’m working on meta RL projects. Wil share results soon.

item.title: Co-Advise Junior Students
item.description:
I ðŸ‘½ am always passionate about advising / working with junior self-motivated students ðŸ˜¹. Here is a list of my current research interests:

  • Reinforcement Learning: Meta RL, goal-conditioned, hierarchical RL, multi-agent RL, sample-efficient RL, emergent communication, RL for social good (power network)
  • Language Processing: Protein sequence modeling, text generation, question answering

Current

  • Dan Liu, Meta Learning, PhD at McGill University
  • Jikun Kang, Meta RL , PhD at McGill University
  • Filip Tolovski, RL for power network , master at Freie University Berlin

2020

  • Bingchan Zhao, RL for power network, undergraduate at Peking University master at Peking University
  • Zhijian Duan, RL, undergraduate at Peking University PhD at Peking University

2019

  • Mustafa Alghali, AI for social good, master at AMMI
  • Ronak Pradeep, Question answering, undergraduate at University of Waterloo master at University of Waterloo
  • Ning Dai, Translation, undergraduate at Fudan University research intern at ByteDance

2018

  • Dayiheng Liu, Text generation, PhD at Sichuan University research intern at Microsoft Research Asia
  • Shangbang Long, Adversarial attack, undergraduate at Peking University master at CMU
  • Vardaan Pahuja, Visual question answering, master at Mila PhD at Ohio State University

2017

  • Danlu Chen, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate at Fudan University PhD at UCSD
  • Ritchie Ng, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate at NUS hedge fund

2016

  • Zichuan Lin, RL, undergraduate at Tsinghua University PhD at Tsinghua University

2015

  • Hongyin Luo, Hyperparameter optimization, undergraduate at Tsinghua University PhD at MIT
